english_translation: When wealth arrives, there is the nuisance of relatives,
and the struggle to protect all of it is another thing.

kannada_original: ಸುಳಿದು ಜಿಪುಣತೆ ಮನದಿ ಭಾವ ಮೆರಗಿನ ಕೊರತೆ
english_transliteration: Suḷidu jipuṇate manadi bhāva meragina korate
english_translation: When miserliness enters the mind, there is a lack of emotional sparkle;
There is a burden for each one – Muddu Rāma.
